pre_caption: This is a static shot of an old, weathered lighthouse during a heavy rainstorm. The camera remains still, focusing on the upper portion of the tower against a dark, cloudy sky. The overall mood is somber and atmospheric.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a static shot of an old, weathered lighthouse during a heavy rainstorm. The camera remains still, focusing on the upper portion of the tower against a dark, cloudy sky. The overall mood is somber and atmospheric.
initial_feedback: The shot title upward and not static.
